quote: I'm already pregnant. So, what other shenanigans could I get myself into?
author: Juno

quote: Which would be worse, to live a monster or die as a good man?
author: Teddy Daniels

quote: I know who I am. I'm the dude playing a dude disguised as another dude!
author: Kirk Lazarus

quote: That's a bingo!
author: Hans Landa

quote: I'm going to have to science the s*** out of this.
author: Mark Watney

quote: That's my secret, Captain: I'm always angry.
author: Bruce Banner

quote: You know how I know that you're gay?
author: Cal Naughton Jr.
source: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

quote: Not my tempo.
author: Terence Fletcher

quote: Oh what a day. What a lovely day!
author: Nux

quote: I have had it with these mother------ snakes on this mother------ plane!
author: Neville Flynn

quote: You motorboatin' son of a b****!
author: Jeremy Grey

quote: Look at me. I'm the captain now.
author: Muse

quote: I'm just one stomach flu away from my goal weight.
author: Andy Sachs

quote: I am Groot.
author: Groot

quote: I drink your milkshake. I drink it up.
author: Daniel Plainview

quote: Get off my lawn.
author: Walt Kowalski

quote: I've been a poor man and I've been a rich man. And I choose rich every f****** time!
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: This is Sparta!
author: King Leonidas

quote: You're going to go through life thinking that girls don't like you because you're a nerd. And I want you to know, from the bottom of my heart, that won't be true. It'll be because you're an a**hole.
author: Erica Albright

quote: I am Iron Man.
author: Tony Stark

quote: Chewie, we're home.
author: Han Solo

quote: May the odds ever be in your favor.
author: Effie Trinket

quote: Why so serious?
author: The Joker

quote: I don't know who you are. I don't know what you are. If you are looking for ransom, I can tell you I don't have money. But what I do have are a very particular set of skills. Skills I have acquired over a very long career. Skills that make me a nightmare for people like you. If you let my daughter go now, that'll be the end of it. I will not look for you. I will not pursue you. But if don't, I will look for you, I will find you and I will kill you.
author: Bryan Mills

quote: I wish I knew how to quit you.
author: Jack Twist

quote: Well, I don't want to survive. I want to live.
author: Solomon Northup

quote: What's the most you ever lost on a coin toss?
author: Anton Chigurh

quote: Wakanda forever!
author: T'Challa

quote: Jagshemash!
author: Borat
source: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan

quote: I love you ... most ardently.
author: Mr. Darcy

quote: Florals? For spring. Groundbreaking.
author: Miranda Priestly

quote: If it takes a village to raise a child, it takes a village to abuse one.
author: Mitchell Garabedian

quote: You see this guy staring back at you? That’s your toughest opponent. I believe that’s true in the ring and I think that’s true in life.
author: Rocky Balboa

quote: Our art is a reflection of our reality
author: Ice Cube

quote: Musicians play their instruments. I play the orchestra.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I dont give a f**k! This is LAPD; I’m the only ‘gangster’ around here!
author: LAPD Officer

quote: I’m a Catholic whore currently enjoying congress out of wedlock with my black Jewish boyfriend who works at the military abortion clinic. So hail Satan and have a lovely afternoon, madam.
author: Harry Hart

quote: Fine. When I yell ‘fool,’ you drive out of here as fast as you can.
author: Imperator Furiosa

quote: If Neil deGrasse Tyson were writing about Ice Cube, this is what it would look like.
author: Malcolm Adekanbi

quote: Would it Help?
author: Rudolf Abel

quote: It can camouflage!
author: Hamada

quote: Just when it can’t get any worse, you run out of cigarettes.
author: Carol

quote: The city is flying. We’re fighting an army of robots. And I have a bow and arrow. None of this makes sense.
author: Hawkeye

quote: In Another Life, I Would Have Really Liked Just Doing Laundry and Taxes With You.
author: Waymond Wang

quote: Everyone Keeps Telling Me How My Story Is Supposed To Go. Nah. I’ma Do My Own Thing.
author: Miles Morales

quote: If You Leave You Lose Things, You Gain Something Too.
author: Nora's Mom

quote: Just Keep Telling the Story.
author: Schubert Green

quote: Now I Am Become Death; The Destroyer of Worlds.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: May Thy Knife Chip and Shatter
author: Paul Atreides

quote: Whatever You Plan on Happening Never Happens. Stuff You Will Never Think of Happens. So You Have to C’mon, C’mon, C’mon, C’mon, C’mon.
author: Jesse

quote: It Is Literally Impossible To Be a Woman. You Are So Beautiful and So Smart, and It Kills Me That You Don’t Think You’re Good Enough.
author: Gloria

quote: I Feel as if I’m Losing All My Leaves. The Branches and the Wind and the Rain. I Don’t Know What’s Happening Anymore.
author: Anthony

quote: We’re Already Sick of Each Other. It’s The Best.
author: Nyles

quote: There should be no boundaries to human endeavour. We are all different. However bad life may seem, there is always something you can do, and succeed at. While there’s life, there is hope.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: I have been falling… for 30 minutes!
author: Loki

quote: I work for the KGB, baby.
author: Anna

quote: Let’s go get drunk and make love.
author: Dean

quote: Do you think America give a flying rat’s ass about you or me? America doesn’t bail out the losers. America was built by bailing out winners. By rigging a nation of the winners, for the winners, by the winners.
author: Rick

quote: I’m gonna tear up the fucking dancefloor, check it out.
author: Nathan

quote: There are rich teams, and there are poor teams. Then there’s fifty feet of crap, and then there’s us.
author: Billy

quote: Ah, you think darkness is your ally? You merely adopted the dark. I was born in it, moulded by it. I didn’t see the light until I was already a man, by then it was nothing to me but blinding!
author: Bane

quote: That’s what I love about music. Even the most banal scenes are suddenly invested with so much meaning, you know? All these banalities, they suddenly turn into these beautiful, effervescent pearls.
author: Dan

quote: My name is… Jeff.
author: Jenko

quote: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.
author: Dumbledore
source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

quote: In a million years, when kids go to school, they gonna know: Once there was a Hushpuppy, and she lived with her daddy in the Bathtub.
author: Hushpuppy

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
author: Jordan

quote: I ain’t afraid to die anymore, I’ve done it already.
author: Hugh

quote: You is kind. You is smart. You is important.
author: Aibileen

quote: When will the lesson be learned! You cannot reason with a tiger when your head is in its mouth!
author: Churchill

quote: You’re the only man who’s ever touched me.
author: Black

quote: They’re idiots. They’ve all been knighted. Makes it official then
author: Lionel

quote: I mean they spend their whole life looking for Prince Charming and then they marry the guy who’s got a good job and is gonna stick around.
author: Dean

quote: Man, glass tables are acting weird tonight.
author: Kevin

quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
author: Louis

quote: At age eleven, I audited my parents. Believe me, there were some discrepancies, and I was grounded.
author: Allen

quote: Career suicide is not so bad when you consider the alternative is suicide by career.
author: Elizabeth

quote: I suspect foul play. I have eliminated no suspects.
author: Benoit

quote: What? I’m menstruating. Why is that a big deal?
author: Abbie

quote: You’re taught your entire life that what you do matters and that you’re special. And that, there are things you can point towards that would… which’ll show that you’re special, that show you’re different, when, in all reality, those things… don’t matter. And you’re not special.
author: Warren

quote: Know your place. Keep your place. Be a shoe.
author: Mason

quote: Shame isn’t a strong enough emotion to stop us from doing anything at all. Believe me.
author: Michèle

quote: Spring break. Spring break. Spring break forever!
author: Alien

quote: Now this is my worst, okay? This is my worst. But I’m gonna get better. You just gotta give me a chance to get better.
author: Dean

quote: You know what, I can overthink everything and find a million ways to doubt myself. And since Charles left, I’ve been really thinking about that part of myself and, I’ve just come to realise that, we’re only here briefly. And while I’m here, I wanna allow myself… joy.
author: Amy

quote: When I’m around you, I kind of feel like I’m on drugs. Not that I do drugs. Unless you do drugs, in which case I do them all the time. All of them.
author: Scott Pilgrim

quote: The moment you catch feelings is the moment you catch a bullet.
author: Bats

quote: Apes together strong!
author: Caesar
source: War for the Planet of the Apes

quote: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist.
author: Tony Stark

quote: All of humanity’s problems stem from man’s inability to sit quietly in a room alone.
author: Nathalie

quote: Courage is the solution to despair, reason provides no answers. I can’t know what the future will bring; we have to choose despite uncertainty. Wisdom is holding two contradictory truths in our mind, simultaneously, hope and despair. A life without despair is a life without hope. Holding these two ideas in our head is life itself.
author: Reverend Toller

quote: I fucked up my whole life because of the way you sing.
author: Jesse

quote: You don’t get to choose if you get hurt in this world, but you do have a say in who hurts you. And I like my choices. I hope she likes hers. Okay, Hazel Grace?
author: Gus

quote: Ba-ba-ba… dook! Dook! Dook!
author: Amelia

quote: Goodbye, yard! Goodbye, crepe myrtle! Goodbye, mailbox! Goodbye, box of stuff Mommy won’t let us take with us but we don’t want to throw away. Goodbye, house, I’ll never like Mommy as much for making us move! Samantha! Why don’t you say goodbye to that little horseshit attitude, okay, because we’re not taking that in the car.
author: Samantha / mother

quote: But if you put the hammer in an elevator? It’ll still go up. Elevator’s not worthy.
author: Captain America / Iron Man

quote: A man becomes a critic when he cannot be an artist, the same way that a man becomes an informer when he cannot be a solider.
author: Mike
source: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)

quote: Crazy is building your ark after the flood has already come.
author: Howard

quote: Look at my shit!
author: Alien

quote: When you love someone you have to be careful with it, you might never get it again.
author: Edward

quote: Time, you know, takes everybody out. It’s undefeated.
author: Rocky
